summary:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Ether ETFs lost $505M in just 4 days, a wild slide.
• Bitcoin ETFs flipped that script, gaining $173M—yikes, what a turnaround.
• Total crypto ETF assets now sit at $1.43B, still a hefty sum.

Impact — Ether’s losing steam while Bitcoin steals the spotlight, shifting the crypto power dynamic.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/09/05/ether-enthusiasm-cools-as-etfs-shed-usd505m-in-4-day-slide-flipping-bitcoin-funds
